jamcorder 0.4


Windows
-------

if you want mp3 compression, you have to download lame.exe into the "bin" directory.





How to build a .exe from the python source on windows:

You have to download/install :

Python 2.4 or newer
http://python.org

wxPython 2.6 or newer
http://www.wxpython.org/download.php (choose the python 2.4 w32-unicode runtime)


pymedia 1.3.5-pre1 or newer
http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=86491&package_id=89813 (choose the -py2.4.exe one)


Py2exe
http://starship.python.net/crew/theller/py2exe/ (choose the python 2.4 build)
(http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/py2exe/py2exe-0.6.2.win32-py2.4.exe?download)
